name: Around the Wound
description:
Welcome blood unit!

Your mission is simple: get to the wound and seal it, but be careful - you are not alone out there.

Made by: 

Reispfannenfresser (Programming, Gamedesign)

Skogkatt (Art, Music, Gamedesign)

______________________________________

Programs used: Unity, Gimp, Cakewalk. 

______________________________________

This game was created within one week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. 

All game assets were made during  game jam week and no third party assets from side sources were used. Thank you for playing!
